verses.verse: Now there was a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7027>Kish<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H22>Abiel<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6872>Zeror<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1064>Becorath<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H647>Aphiah<s%>, the son of a <S%H1145>Benjamite<s%>, a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H2428>valor<s%>.

And he had a <S%H1121>son<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, a young <S%H970>man<s%> and a <S%H2896>goodly<s%>: and there was not among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> a <S%H2896>goodlier<s%> <S%H376>person<s%> than <S%H7926>he<s%>: from his shoulders and <S%H4605>upward<s%> he was <S%H1364>higher<s%> than any of the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And the <S%H860>asses<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish<s%>, <S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H1>father<s%>, were <S%H6>lost<s%>. And <S%H7027>Kish<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H3947>Take<s%> now <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H5288>servants<s%> with <S%H6965>thee<s%>, and arise, <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H860>asses<s%>.

And he passed <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, and passed <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8031>Shalishah<s%>, but they <S%H4672>found<s%> them <S%H5674>not<s%>: then they passed through the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8171>Shaalim<s%>, and there they were <S%H5674>not<s%>: and he passed through the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1145>Benjamites<s%>, but they found them <S%H4672>not<s%>.

When they were <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H6689>Zuph<s%>, <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5288>servant<s%> that was with <S%H3212>him<s%>, Come, and let us <S%H7725>return<s%>, lest my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H2308>leave<s%> off caring for the <S%H860>asses<s%>, and be anxious for <S%H1672>us<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5892>him<s%>, Behold now, there is in this city a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and he is a <S%H376>man<s%> that is held in <S%H3513>honor<s%>; all that he <S%H1696>saith<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%> surely to <S%H935>pass<s%>: now let us <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H5046>thither<s%>; peradventure he can tell us concerning our <S%H1870>journey<s%> whereon we <S%H1980>go<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to his <S%H5288>servant<s%>, <S%H3212>But<s%>, behold, if we go, what shall we <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%>? for the <S%H3899>bread<s%> is <S%H235>spent<s%> in our <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, and there is not a <S%H8670>present<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>: what have we?

And the <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H4672>Behold<s%>, I have in my <S%H3027>hand<s%> the fourth <S%H7253>part<s%> of a <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>: that will I <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H5046>tell<s%> us our <S%H1870>way<s%>.

(Beforetime <S%H6440><s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, when a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, thus he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3212>Come<s%>, and let us <S%H3212>go<s%> to the <S%H7200>seer<s%>; for he that is <S%H3117>now<s%> called a <S%H5030>Prophet<s%> was <S%H6440>beforetime<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> a <S%H7200>Seer<s%>.)

Then <S%H1697>said<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to his <S%H5288>servant<s%>, <S%H2896>Well<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>; <S%H3212>come<s%>, let us <S%H3212>go<s%>. So they <S%H3212>went<s%> unto the <S%H5892>city<s%> where the <S%H376>man<s%> of God <S%H430>was<s%>.

As they went <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H5927>ascent<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%>, they <S%H4672>found<s%> young <S%H5291>maidens<s%> going <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7579>draw<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3426>them<s%>, Is the seer <S%H7200>here<s%>?

And they <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H559>them<s%>, and said, He <S%H3426>is<s%>; <S%H6440>behold<s%>, he is before <S%H4116>thee<s%>: make haste <S%H935>now<s%>, for he is come <S%H3117>to-day<s%> into the <S%H5892>city<s%>; for the <S%H5971>people<s%> have a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> <S%H3117>to-day<s%> in the high <S%H1116>place<s%>:

as soon as ye are <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H5892>city<s%>, ye shall <S%H3651>straightway<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H5927>him<s%>, before he goeth up to the high <S%H1116>place<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%>; for the <S%H5971>people<s%> will not <S%H398>eat<s%> until he <S%H935>come<s%>, because he doth <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>; and <S%H310>afterwards<s%> they <S%H398>eat<s%> that are <S%H7121>bidden<s%>. Now therefore get you <S%H5927>up<s%>; for at this <S%H3117>time<s%> ye shall find <S%H4672>him<s%>.

And they went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H7125>to<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>; and as they <S%H935>came<s%> within the <S%H5892>city<s%>, <S%H8050>behold<s%>, Samuel came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>toward<s%> <S%H5927>them<s%>, to go up to the high <S%H1116>place<s%>.
Now <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had <S%H1540>revealed<s%> <S%H241>unto<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H935>came<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> about this <S%H6256>time<s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> thee a <S%H376>man<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H4886>anoint<s%> him to be <S%H5057>prince<s%> over my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and he shall <S%H3467>save<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>: for I have <S%H7200>looked<s%> upon my <S%H5971>people<s%>, because their <S%H6818>cry<s%> is come unto <S%H935>me<s%>.

And when <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6030>said<s%> unto <S%H376>him<s%>, Behold, the man of whom I <S%H559>spake<s%> to <S%H6113>thee<s%>! this same shall have authority over my <S%H5971>people<s%>.

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> drew <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H8432>in<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5046>Tell<s%> <S%H335>me<s%>, I pray thee, where the <S%H7200>seer<s%>'s house <S%H1004>is<s%>.

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, I am the <S%H7200>seer<s%>; go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me unto the high <S%H1116>place<s%>, for ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> with me <S%H3117>to-day<s%>: and in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> I will let thee <S%H7971>go<s%>, and will <S%H5046>tell<s%> thee all that is in thy <S%H3824>heart<s%>.

And as for thine <S%H860>asses<s%> that were <S%H6>lost<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H3117>ago<s%>, <S%H7760>set<s%> not they <S%H3820>mind<s%> on <S%H4672>them<s%>; for they are found. And for whom is all that is <S%H2532>desirable<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? Is it not for <S%H1>thee<s%>, and for all thy father's <S%H1004>house<s%>?

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, Am not I a <S%H1145>Benjamite<s%>, of the <S%H6996>smallest<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? and my <S%H4940>family<s%> the <S%H6810>least<s%> of all the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>? wherefore then <S%H1696>speakest<s%> thou to me after this <S%H1697>manner<s%>?

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H5288>servant<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> them into the <S%H3957>guest-chamber<s%>, and made them <S%H5414>sit<s%> in the <S%H7218>chiefest<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> among them that were <S%H7121>bidden<s%>, who were about <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H376>persons<s%>.

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H2876>cook<s%>, <S%H5414>Bring<s%> the <S%H4490>portion<s%> which I <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H559>thee<s%>, of which I said unto <S%H7760>thee<s%>, Set it by thee.

And the <S%H2876>cook<s%> took <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H7785>thigh<s%>, and that which was upon <S%H7760>it<s%>, and set it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>. And Samuel <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7604>Behold<s%>, that which hath been reserved! <S%H7760>set<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> thee and <S%H398>eat<s%>; because unto the appointed <S%H4150>time<s%> hath it been <S%H8104>kept<s%> for <S%H559>thee<s%>, for I said, I have <S%H7121>invited<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>. So <S%H7586>Saul<s%> did <S%H398>eat<s%> with <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%>.
And when they were come <S%H3381>down<s%> from the high <S%H1116>place<s%> into the <S%H5892>city<s%>, he <S%H1696>communed<s%> with <S%H7586>Saul<s%> upon the <S%H1406>housetop<s%>.

And they arose <S%H7925>early<s%>: and it came to pass about the <S%H5927>spring<s%> of the <S%H7837>day<s%>, that <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul<s%> on the <S%H1406>housetop<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H6965>Up<s%>, that I may send thee <S%H7971>away<s%>. And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and they went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of <S%H8050>them<s%>, he and Samuel, <S%H2351>abroad<s%>.

As they were going <S%H3381>down<s%> at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, <S%H559>Bid<s%> the <S%H5288>servant<s%> pass <S%H5674>on<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5674>us<s%> (and he passed on), but <S%H5975>stand<s%> thou still <S%H3117>first<s%>, that I may cause thee to <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.
